title: Blaze and the Mountain Lion
description: Loyal friends Billy and his horse, Blaze, come face-to-face with a ferocious mountain lion while traveling west. Fortunately, theyâ€™re able to chase the wildcat into its den and save a frightened calf from near death. Billy and Blaze help capture the cat before it can emerge, and, heroes once again, ride the range in search of new adventures! Blaze and the Mountain Lion is part of the classic Billy and Blaze series. Sensitive drawings and easy-to-read words capture the warmth and understanding between a boy and his horse.
author: C.W. Anderson
